actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to provide for the coverage of certain social work services under the supplementary medical insurance benefits program and the medicaid program.

summary.text: Amends Titles XVIII (Medicare) and XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide payment for the services of clinical social workers. Defines the educational and professional qualifications required for the designation "clinical social workers."

titles.title: A bill to amend titles XVIII and XIX of the Social Security Act to provide for the coverage of certain social work services under the supplementary medical insurance benefits program and the medicaid program.
